name: Guns N Stuff 2
description:
Guns N Stuff 2

A fast-paced third-person shooter with up to four players. Fight with a variety of 30+ weapons on 25+ maps. Grab a weapon as quickly as possible, whether
it is a simple pistol or a viking helmet, and get to killing.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Online 4 player PVP
- 4 Unique Biomes
- 30+ Unique Weapons
- Free for all or Team-Based


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Depending on game popularity, Guns N Stuff 2 will continue to recieve updates including but not limited to,

- Additional maps
- Additional weapons
- Additional gamemodes (first addition likely a zombies mode)
